forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 82. East southeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. East northeast wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. West northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
